FLOW.COMMENT: Get OA sysdate required for the mapping

INVOKE.COMMENT: Get Move Order Lines based on the information from BizDoc

MAP.COMMENT: For each LINE_ID, map a record into outArrayPickConfirmRecordSet

INVOKE.COMMENT: Get the number of LINE_IDs for this BizDoc

BRANCH.COMMENT: Based on the number of LINE_IDs

MAP.COMMENT: If there are no matching LINE_ID, then generate outArrayPickConfirmResults
